alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Dale and northeastern Coffee Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of New Brockton, or 11 miles northeast of Elba, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Fort Novosel, Enterprise, Ozark, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Ariton, Lee, Clayhatchee, Mixons Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald, Central City, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville and Roeton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
